about_the_game:
The Paratopic: Definitive Cut Soundtrack includes all the original compositions written and produced for the game by composer & sound designer Lazzie Brown, alias BeauChaotica/Lazarus Audio. Remastered to stand on their own outside the game, this is the Special Edition of the OST, originally only available as a bonus purchase on itch, and consists of two collections.

The Standard Edition Files form the main soundtrack. The Special Edition Files include additional un-used demo versions of in-game tracks, the radio broadcasts in full (with a much clearer signal!), and a couple of other goodies. Files are provided in mp3 and FLAC.

Full Tracklist:

Standard Edition Files, Prefixed with '1' for Disc 1:
1. Paratopic (Menu Theme)
2. Interrogation
3. The Diner
4. The Hub
5. Open All Hours
6. Urban Dreamscape (Apartments Theme)
7. Birdwatcher’s Theme
8. Birdwatcher’s Intrusion
9. Assassin’s Theme
10. The Future Is Bright

Special Edition Files, Prefixed with '2' for Disc 2:
1. Paratopic Trailer
2. Apartments FX Demo
3. Birdwatch Demo 1
4. Birdwatch Demo 2
5. Forecourt Shadow
6. Assassin’s Theme Early Mix
7. TV Head
8. Paratopic Radio – Channel 1 – ParaTalk
9. Paratopic Radio – Channel 2 – Carlos AM
